dialogue.text: The dock is right ahead. Your boat will be leaving very soon, so I advise you hurry.
I can't thank you enough, Mr. Wayfinder, sir.
It is my pleasure. Farewell, Sweet. Your partner awaits you at the end of your voyage.
Farewell!
Savor your moments together. I know too well what it’s like to have something loved lost so quickly.
A few hours later... on the streets of Enzync City...
Today's the day... Man, I never get this nervous for dates.
Though her not responding to my texts ain't helping-!
She always responds quickly... I'm hoping she's OK…
I should've just bought her a plane ticket instead... I freakin' hate boats.
What if she missed her boat? Then it'll take her a whole 'nother day to get here...
Ugh, this sucks! Why didn't I-
Woah, reign it in there, cousin. You're thinking out loud. Emphasis on 'loud'.
Wh- Umami? Wasn't expecting to see you today. I thought you worked all weekdays.
It's a Saturday, hun. You must've been real focused on meeting up with this new girl to forget that.
Yeah... it's just been a while since I've been with someone, and she's a very special person, and-
Say less, cousin. I know you're worried, but she's a grown woman. Things will be a-ok.
The air's real thin when your head’s high in the clouds, y'know?
...what's that supposed to mean?
You can't act right if you've got too much on your mind. So let's get your head back on the ground.
Music always helps us focus, so how's a quick jam sound?
Forreal? Hmm… Yeah, sure. Anything to take my mind off worrying.
'Yeah, sure'? C'mon now, that's not how our family starts a performance. Show me the spirit your mama taught ya!
Alright, alright. Let's do this!
